original: The game will auto save whenever you enter a new map
translate: When enabled, the game will auto save whenever you enter a new map

original: The game will auto save whenever you make camp
translate: When enabled, the game will auto save whenever you make camp

original: The degree to which the game shows tactical symbols and a grid during combat
translate: The degree to which the game shows tactical symbols and a grid during combat

original: If set to true, the game will automatically show tactical icons during the planning state
translate: When enabled, the game will automatically show tactical icons during the planning state

original: If set to false, the tactical icons will only show when holding down SHIFT
translate: When disabled, the tactical icons will only show when holding down SHIFT

original: Whether or not the game shows a grid along with the tactical icons when activated during combat
translate: Whether or not the game shows a grid along with the tactical icons when activated during combat

original: Setting this to Enabled will show a tooltip box containing info on light levels and stealth modifiers for tiles when you right click them
translate: When enabled, this will show a tooltip box containing info on light levels and stealth modifiers for tiles when you right click them

original: This adjusts how long the on-screen combat pop-up text lingers
translate: This adjusts how long the on-screen combat pop-up text lingers

original: Note that a turn does not progress until all the character’s pop-up text is gone, so adjusting this number will also adjust how quickly combat turns pass
translate: Note that a turn does not progress until all the character’s pop-up text is gone, so adjusting this number will also adjust how quickly combat turns pass

original: The degree to which you want the game to offer gameplay tutorials during play
translate: The degree to which you want the game to offer gameplay tutorials during play

original: The sensitivity of the joystick used for moving the cursor when using a controller
translate: The sensitivity of the joystick used for moving the cursor when using a controller

original: Select the display language for the game
translate: Select the display language for the game

original: The current difficulty of the game
translate: The current difficulty of the game

original: Easy mode is a great way for players who are new to this style of roleplaying game to experience Skald
translate: Easy mode is best suited to beginners and newcomers to this style of roleplaying game who wish for a light introduction to its concepts through Skald

original: Combat is forgiving and there should be little need to optimize character builds
translate: Combat should be relatively forgiving, with little need to optimise character builds and loadouts

original: Dice rolls are weighted in the player’s favor
translate: Dice rolls are also weighted in the player’s favour

original: Normal mode is the game’s intended difficulty setting
translate: Normal mode is the default difficulty, and the intended way to experience Skald

original: There is only very limited artificial smoothing of certain dice rolls
translate: Dice rolls only see minor alterations, to artificially smooth them and improve the experience

original: Dice rolls are slightly weighted in the opponent's favor making them more deadly
translate: Dice rolls are slightly weighted in the opponent's favour, making foes more punishing; putting additional emphasis on player preparation and consistency

original: You're trying to edit the difficulty so the difficulty options are now being set to the ‘CUSTOM’ values
translate: You're trying to edit the difficulty so the difficulty options are now being set to the “CUSTOM” values

original: The custom difficulty will be saved and you can toggle back and forth between ‘CUSTOM’ difficulty and the pre-set difficulties any time
translate: The custom difficulty will be saved and you can toggle back and forth between “CUSTOM” difficulty and the pre-set difficulties any time

original: Narrative mode is the difficulty for players who would like to experience the game’s story and setting with a minimum of focus on combat and grinding
translate: Narrative mode is best suited for players primarily seeking to experience the game's story with combat being a secondary way to add flavour to the narrative

original: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the player's Attribute Check (Skill Checks for instance) dice rolls that many times and pick the most favorable one to the player
translate: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the player's Attribute Check (Skill Checks, for instance) dice rolls by the amount specified, choosing the roll most favourable to the player

original: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the player's Combat dice rolls (such as Attack Rolls or Defence Rolls) that many times and pick the most favorable one to the player
translate: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the player's Combat dice rolls (such as Attack Rolls or Defence Rolls) by the amount specified, choosing the roll most favourable to the player

original: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the player's damage dice rolls that many times and pick the most favorable one to the player
translate: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the player's damage dice rolls by the amount specified, choosing the roll most favourable to the player

original: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the enemy's Combat dice rolls (such as Attack Rolls or Defence Rolls) that many times and pick the most favorable one to the enemy
translate: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the enemy's Combat dice rolls (such as Attack Rolls or Defence Rolls) by the amount specified, choosing the roll most favourable to the enemy

original: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the enemy's damage dice rolls that many times and pick the most favorable one to the enemy
translate: If this number is greater than zero, the system will reroll any of the enemy's damage dice rolls by the amount specified, choosing the roll most favourable to the player

original: The degree to which the engine compensates player miss streaks by increasing To-Hit chances
translate: The degree to which the engine compensates player miss streaks by increasing To-Hit chances

original: If Enabled, the party will heal fully after each combat
translate: If Enabled, the party will fully heal after each combat

original: If Enabled, the party has no limit to carrying capacity
translate: If Enabled, the party has no limit to its carrying capacity

original: If Enabled, the main PC can never die in combat
translate: If Enabled, the main Player Character cannot die in combat

original: If Enabled, XP will also be given to downed characters after combat
translate: If Enabled, experience will also be given to downed characters after combat

original: If Enabled, the party does not need to consume food
translate: If Enabled, the party no longer needs to consume food when resting, which is normally required in the recovery of injuries and the replenishment of Hitpoints. One may still gather and consume food, but it is entirely cosmetic; an intentional undertaking done for the sake of role playing

original: If Enabled, the party will not encounter 'trash mob' encounters on the overland map
translate: If Enabled, the party will no longer run into foes randomly, JRPG style, on the overworld map. Enabling this feature only prevents the player encountering foes, not other overworld events such as merchants or flotsam

original: The To-Hit roll is made by comparing the Attacker's Attack Roll to the Defender's Defence Roll
translate: The To-Hit roll is made by comparing the Attacker's Attack Roll to the Defender's Defence Roll

original: If the Attacker rolls equal to or higher than the Defence Roll the attack is a hit
translate: If the Attacker rolls equal to or higher than the Defence Roll the attack is a hit

original: The Attack Roll is calulated in the following way
translate: The Attack Roll is calculated in the following way

original: 2d6 + Melee To Hit / Ranged To Hit + Misc
translate: 2d6 + Melee To Hit / Ranged To Hit + Misc

original: Simulates rolling and adding up two six-sided dice
translate: Simulates rolling and adding up two six-sided dice

original: In other words a 2d6 roll generates a number between 2 and
translate: In other words, a 2d6 roll generates a number between 2 and

original: The ability to avoid incoming attacks and other reflex-based dangers
translate: Represents how adept a character is at avoiding incoming attacks and other reflex-based dangers

original: In other words, this determines how hard a character is to hit
translate: In other words, this determines how hard a character is to hit

original: The character's skill at attacking with melee weapons
translate: The character's skill at attacking with melee weapons

original: The characters skill at attacking with ranged weapons
translate: The characters skill at attacking with ranged weapons

original: Accuracy is added to an attacker's Attack Roll when trying to hit an opponent
translate: Accuracy is added to an attacker's Attack Roll when trying to hit an opponent

original: Accuracy is typically derived from a weapon's quality
translate: Accuracy is typically derived from a weapon's quality

original: This feature should only be disabled if you experience performance issues. Editors note: As of patch 1.0.7, hovering over this option results in a temporary slow-down that may persist until you exist this options window. Try pressing the 1 or Esc key to quit quickly!
translate: Applying one of these filters gives the game a fuzzy, retro aesthetic

original: Allows the game to be played in full screen or windowed mode
translate: Allows the game to be played in either fullscreen or windowed mode

original: The scale of the window when run in Window mode
translate: The scale of the window when run in windowed mode

original: VSync prevents artifacts such as screen tearing
translate: Enabling VSync has the game run at the refresh rate your monitor. It also may also aid in the prevention of screen tearing and other artifacts

original: The console uses the classic C64 color theme
translate: The console uses the classic C64 colour theme

original: If enabled it will use the game’s blended lighting system
translate: If enabled, it will use the game’s blended lighting system

original: This feature should only be disabled if you experience performance issues
translate: This feature should only be disabled if you experience performance issues. Editor's note: As of patch 1.0.7, hovering over this option results in temporary slow-down that may persist until you leave the display options window. Try pressing 1 or Esc on your keyboard, or for controller/Steam Deck users, the relevant button shown below with the Exit command to quit to the main menu

original: If enabled the game will render weather effects like fog and rain
translate: If enabled the game will render weather effects like fog and rain

original: Disabling this option may increase performance
translate: Disabling this option may increase performance

original: Whether or not to allow the screen-shake visual effect
translate: Whether or not to allow the screen-shake visual effect

original: The volume of the sound effects
translate: The volume of the sound effects

original: The font used for most descriptions
translate: The font used for most descriptions

original: This is what a quote looks like
translate: This is what a quote looks like

original: The color of the main descriptive text
translate: The colour of the main descriptive text

original: The color of the main descriptive text that is displayed in quotation marks
translate: The colour of the main descriptive text that is displayed in quotation marks

original: The color of the main descriptive text's drop-down shadow
translate: The colour of the main descriptive text's drop-down shadow

original: Draws an outline around the letters instead of a drop-down shadow
translate: Draws an outline around the letters instead of a drop-down shadow

original: The color of certain UI-elements behind text
translate: The colour of certain UI-elements upon which descriptive text sits

original: Adjust this to increase the contrast between text and background
translate: Adjust this to increase the contrast between the text and background

original: Name must be between 3 and 60 characters long and must be a valid file-name
translate: Name must be between 3 and 60 characters long and must be a valid file name

original: Are you sure you want to delete the following save
translate: Are you sure you want to delete the following save

original: Do you really want to quit the game?
translate: Are you certain you wish to quit to the desktop?
Any unsaved progress will be lost

original: This can also be customized in the SETTINGS menu
translate: These options can be customised later in the SETTINGS menu

original: The skin of the dice being rolled during skill-tests
translate: The appearance of the dice rolled during skill tests

original: Toggles the special ‘nostalgic UI’ that may remind you of classic RPG series we all know and love
translate: When enabled, this changes the user interface to a special, nostalgic one reminiscent of a classic CRPG series fondly remembered by many

original: Activating this filter gives the game a fuzzy retro look
translate: Applies the selected filter to give the game a fuzzy, retro aesthetic

original: Are you sure you want to overwrite the following save
translate: Are you sure you want to overwrite the following save
